subtitle: A filling and nutritious pasta dish.

method.text: Place the tagliatelle with the oil, in a large bowl. Cover with boiling, salted water. Cover the dish and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 3 min. Stir, then reduce to 30% (MEDIUM LOW) power for 7-8 min until pasta is 'al dente' when tasted.

Melt 25 g butter in a large bowl for 1 min. Add the onion, cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 2 min. Add the spinach and heat through on 100% (FULL) power for 3 min. Stir in the cream.  Season to taste.

Arrange layers of the tagliatelle, spinach and finely grated Cheddar cheese in a serving dish. Cover and heat through on 100% (FULL) power for 5-6 min. Scatter over the breadcrumbs. Dot with the remaining butter. Sprinkle with the Parmesan cheese.
Cook uncovered on 100% (FULL) power for 2-3 min until the butter is melted or, alternatively, brown under a hot preheated grill. Serve immediately, sprinkled with a little grated nutmeg.

title: Tagliatelle and spinach gratinee - microwave
